resources.string:
Chinese zodiac, or shēngxiào (生肖; lit. born resembling), is represented by 12 zodiac animals. In order, they are the Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Goat, Monkey, Rooster, Dog, and Pig.
In Ancient China, for enumerate the years were used the emperors\' names and the Ganzhi System. The first lunar calendar was invented in 2937 b.C.. According to this, each zodiacal sign last 60 years distributed in 5 cycles of 12 years. Since Han\'s dynasty (25-220 a.C.) chinese zodiacal begun to use the 12 animals in order.

Rats are wisely people, who enjoy being surrounded of family and friends, helping them in everything. Rats are great workers, savers and resource managers.
Lucky numbers: 2, 3
Lucky colors: blue, gold, green

Oxes are patient and calm people, also very warm and lovely who command respect. Great workers who enjoy the order and cleaning, and achieve success thanks to their effort. Family is the most important even when they are jealous. Oxes love art. They don\'t like dispute but enjoy being obeyed.
Lucky numbers; 1, 4
Lucky colors: blue, yellow, green

Tigers are very passionate and energetic people. They are very noticeable, adventurers, independent, witty, visceral, and enjoy the fun. Tigers are lifelong friends, even when they always want to be the leader in a group. Whit their couples, they show themselves as the strongest, sexiest and the most seductive, but that behaviour could be excessive.
Lucky numbers; 1, 3, 4
Lucky colors: blue, grey, white, orange

Rabbits are prudent, intelligent, affable, discreet, anticipatory, attentive and benevolent. That\'s why rabbits are so popular between people. They have very moderate and indulgent character, lovers of the peace and concord. Rabbits hate the war and violence. They enjoy the calm lifestyle, the cuteness and the harmony.
Lucky numbers; 3, 4, 9
Lucky colors: blue, purple, pink, red

China\'s Emperor\'s symbol, dragons are very imaginative, magnanimous, entrepreneur, lucky and mighty. They are strength and vitality fulled. Dragons are very energetic, and if they got mad, they will lose their control; once they are like that, it\'s difficult calm they down, because dragons don\'t use to trust in anyone. They give good advice and are very lucky with money and love. Dragons fall in love so easy and intensely.
Lucky numbers; 1, 6, 7
Lucky colors: gold, silver, grayish, white

Snakes are astute people, they know what they want and how to get it. Their conversation is elegant and fluent. They are intense but prudent, are jealous and possessive with their family but loyal. Snakes enjoy pamper their friends and hope the same. If dragons have feelings of disdain or failure, they could be angry for hours, but they are good for keep calm and seem quiet in difficult situations.
Lucky numbers; 2, 8, 9
Lucky colors: red, pale yellow, black

Horses are popular, energetic, adventurer, eloquent, impatient, entrepreneur, enthusiast with life, and great lovers and friends. They really love money and traveling. Horses enjoy meeting new people, different cultures, to speak various languages and the are the soul of the party. Horses\' physical attractiveness and beauty make easier to find couple.
Lucky numbers; 1, 4
Lucky colors: blue, yellow, green

Goats are creative, artistic, positive, elegant, feminine, affable, merciful, weeping, sensitive, dreamer, proud, and sad. They don\'t chase material wealth and prefer their dreams. They love family, children, home, and keep in contact with nature. Goats are very hard-working, but they don\'t like or deadlines.
Lucky numbers; 3, 4, 9
Lucky colors: green, red, purple

Most human-like animal, monkeys are ingenious, funny, friendly, quick and active minded, comparator, persuasive, sociable, able to face any problem easily, no matter how difficult it is. Their romantic and friendly relationships use to be troubled because they don\'t tolerate that the others don\'t appreciate them. Monkeys are in good health, but they suffer their own excesses.
Lucky numbers; 1, 7, 8
Lucky colors: white, gold, blue

Roosters are attractive and seductive, very talented and appreciated people. They are meticulous, efficient, ordered, observer, selfish, usurer, pragmatic, and very familiar people. They are romantic and stubborn at love, they fight for control their couple. Roosters are very noticeable at public relationships and as artists. They don\'t care too much about their health.
Lucky numbers; 5, 7, 8
Lucky colors: gold, brown, yellow

Dogs are hard-workers, honest, reliable, diligent people, with a strong sense of justice and loyalty. They win everyone with their exciting personality, their good humor and great capacity to hear the others\' problems and give good advice. They are really faithful and loyal, but are very jealous with their couple when they aren\'t at home. Jitters are their worst health problem.
Lucky numbers; 3, 4, 9
Lucky colors: green, red, purple

Pigs are sincere, honest, reliant, educated, affectioned, serviceable, brave, decided, with great willpower, with no big claims neither vanity, down to earth people. They are friendly, with tasteful and good manners. Pigs are sensual, passionate and patient at love, but until a point. They are very hard-workers but they don\'t enjoy sports, so tend to get fat easily.
Lucky numbers; 2, 5, 8
Lucky colors: yellow, gray, brown, gold
